page.title: 09The Climate at Inverarity.
page.content: January_ Little snow, hard frost, below zero temperetures. Febuary_ Heavy snow,hard frost,winds. March_ High winds,frost,heavy rain. April_ Showers,temperetures rising. May_Rain,high winds,bright sunshine. June_Bright sunshine,light winds, showers. July_ Light winds,bright sunshine, showers. August_ Strong sunshine,high temperetures. September_ Temperetures dropping, moderate winds,showers. October_ Thunder,lightning,heavy rain, little sunshine. November_Light snow,showers,little sunshine. December_Light snow,little sunshine, light rain,hard frost.
